dataList.dlg: This battle will conclude with victory.
Pierce… to the profundities of the heart…
Even if I must disgorge everything…
Come here… I’ll hug you tight…
It is now written. All that remains... is to set you free.
Truth, the truth is right before me... Heheh, Eheheheh, heheh!!!

How does it appear, my form in your eyes?
Perhaps within the clockwork of time the answer lies?
Thus. You cease to move. Trapped in the stopped time. For eternity.

Follow the predetermined path of the tale.
Be ensnared, for that is only right.
Get lost...! The apple, the apple...! Where did you hide it?!

Do you recall the moment when you could breathe free for the first time?
For me... that moment is now.
Take a deep breath... For it will be your last.

In this long journey, in times of restlessness,
search for hope and a future. Find your own answer.

Execute Command: Meltdown. Walk across the dust,
grasp the solitude, and forge on toward the faint and far future.
